Name: team_size_limit
Description: The team size must not exceed 9

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The project budget must not be exceeded

Name: sprint_duration_limit
Description: Sprint duration must be between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: worker_availability
Description: Workers must be available during the sprint

Name: feature_priority
Description: Only high-priority features can be in the sprint backlog

Name: blocker_resolution
Description: All critical blockers must be resolved

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Each task must be assigned to a worker with the required skill

Name: release_plan_feasibility
Description: Release plan must be feasible within the roadmap

Name: scrum_master_experience
Description: Scrum Master must have at least 2 years of experience

Name: epic_status
Description: Only active epics can have user stories
